markets.description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Argentina is the champion of Copa America 2024. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

This market will immediately resolve to “No” if the team is eliminated or otherwise has no path to victory based on the rules of the Copa America 2024.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from Copa America and/or CONMEBOL (e.g. https://copaamerica.com/en), including official footage from matches, however a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.
markets.question: Argentina wins Copa America 2024?
